name: Duke Caribbean: Life's a Beach
description:
Duke Caribbean: Life's a Beach is an action-shooter game developed by Sunstorm Interactive. It came out on 31-12-1997. It was published by WizardWorks. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Duke Caribbean: Life's a Beach is available on PC.
It was produced by George Broussard and Greg Malone. Lee Jackson and Robert Prince scored the game.
